means: 崇拜，尊崇( worship的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: In a sense, they also should have been worshiping the world's plants.
sentence.Network_cn: 从某种意义上说, 他们还应当尊崇地球上的植物.

sentence.Network_en: The great enemy to our worshiping God is busy - ness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们敬拜神常有的大障碍就是繁忙.

sentence.Network_en: In primitive society, people learned art by worshiping gods in ceremonies.
sentence.Network_cn: 在原始时期, 人们往往通过敬神仪式的集体礼拜活动来学习艺术.
